casebody.data:
Lauren GOHL, as Next Friend of J.G., a minor, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Sharon TURBIAK, Defendant-Appellant,
and
Dr. Randy Liepa, Candy Sokol, Shelly Moore, Nancy Respondek, Megan Sprow, Carol DeBeaudry, Tracy Crews, and Diane Sloboda, Defendant-Appellees,
and
Cynthia Deman and Elizabeth Santer, Defendants. SC: 157946, 157947
COA: 335389, 335604 Supreme Court of Michigan. August 8, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to extend the time for filing her reply is GRANTED. The reply will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before August 16, 2018.
